players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let any mafia infiltrators slip through."
Diana: "I'm concerned about Bob's sudden death and think we should all be vigilant. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our village."
